name: ts-simple-logger
description: Simple console logger for browsers and Node.

scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:dist && pnpm run clean:test && pnpm run clean:pack
scripts.check: pnpm run lint && pnpm run check:type
scripts.check:type: pnpm run check:type:src && pnpm run check:type:test
scripts.check:type:test: pnpm run build && pnpm run check:type:test:tsc
scripts.build: pnpm run clean:dist && pnpm run build:bundle && pnpm run build:types
scripts.build:npm: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:types
scripts.pack: pnpm run clean:pack && pnpm run pack:dist
scripts.test: pnpm run clean:test && pnpm run test:unit:coverage && pnpm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: pnpm run test:integration:node && pnpm run test:integration:browser
scripts.test:integration:node: pnpm run build && pnpm run pack && vitest run --config vitest.node.config.ts
scripts.all: pnpm run clean && pnpm run check && pnpm run build && pnpm run test
